import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './accountdetailssection.css' function AccountDetailsSection(props) { const {t,i18n} = props const avatar = 'https://meiadose.com.pt/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/default-user-avatar.png' const [userAvatar,setUserAvatar] = useState() return (

) } export default AccountDetailsSection
